message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $20000.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I think $20000 is a bit steep. I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While $12000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to compromise.  How about $17000? This would still give you a good deal considering the value of this product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $17000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay up to $15000 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
